article_title: State Medicaid director: More than 20,000 HIP 2.0 signups in Lake County

og.description: GARY | More than 20,000 Lake County residents have signed up for the Healthy Indiana Plan this year, though several thousand more qualify but remain uninsured, the state's Medicaid director
